org.bsf.smartValueObject.tools
Class JavaAssistInstrumentor.InstClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  |

        +--org.bsf.smartValueObject.tools.JavaAssistInstrumentor.InstClassLoader
Enclosing class:
JavaAssistInstrumentor
private static class JavaAssistInstrumentor.InstClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

Custom ClassLoader using CtClass. This ClassLoader can be used to define modified classes. It exists mainly for testing purposes.
